mcq.statement: Choose the correctly punctuated sentence: The meeting is scheduled for 3:00 p.m., on Tuesday, October 5th., The meeting is scheduled for 3.00 p.m. on Tuesday, October 5th., The meeting is scheduled for 3:00 p.m. on Tuesday October 5th., None of these

options.a: The meeting is scheduled for 3:00 p.m., on Tuesday, October 5th.
options.b: The meeting is scheduled for 3.00 p.m. on Tuesday, October 5th.
options.c: The meeting is scheduled for 3:00 p.m. on Tuesday October 5th.
